mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.*, mall.taskAll, msu.taskSuss, u.name AS creater FROM inno72_task t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tm.task_id, count( 1 ) AS taskAll FROM inno72_task_machine tm GROUP BY tm.task_id ) mall ON mall.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tm.task_id, count( 1 ) AS taskSuss FROM inno72_task_machine tm WHERE tm.do_status = 1 GROUP BY tm.task_id ) msu ON msu.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN inno72_user u ON u.id = t.create_id where t.status != 9 and t.type = #{type} and t.status = #{status} and t.status in (1,3) ) t ORDER BY t.update_time DESC

SELECT t.*, app.app_name AS appName, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code, m.net_status as machine_planed, CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district,IFNULL( l.mall,""),IFNULL( l.name,"")) as name, area.province as machine_province, tm.task_status AS machine_task_status, tm.do_status AS machine_do_status, tm.do_type AS machine_do_type, tm.do_msg AS machine_do_msg, tm.do_time AS machine_do_time from inno72_task t LEFT JOIN inno72_task_machine tm ON tm.task_id = t.id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON m.id = tm.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON l.id = m.locale_id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.code = l.area_code LEFT JOIN inno72_app app ON app.id = t.app_id WHERE t.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, m.id AS machine_id, m.machine_code AS machine_code FROM inno72_admin_area a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.machine_code, m.id, locale.area_code FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale locale ON locale.id = m.locale_id WHERE m.machine_status in (4,9) ) m ON LEFT ( m.area_code,#{num}) = LEFT ( a.CODE,#{num}) WHERE 1=1 and a.parent_code = #{code} and a.LEVEL = #{level} and m.machine_code = #{machineCode}

SELECT m.id AS code, m.machine_code AS parent_code, m.net_status as planed, CONCAT( area.province, area.city, area.district,IFNULL( locale.mall,""),IFNULL( locale.name,""), '—', m.machine_code ) AS name, area.province, area.city, area.district, area.circle, '5' AS LEVEL FROM inno72_machine m LEFT JOIN inno72_locale locale ON m.locale_id = locale.id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON area.CODE = locale.area_code WHERE m.machine_status in (4,9) and m.machine_code = #{machineCode} and LEFT(locale.area_code,#{num}) =#{code}
SELECT id AS id, app_package_name AS appPackageName, app_type AS appType, app_name AS appName FROM inno72_app a
